text: The 60 metres at the Olympics of Grace was held in Florence at the ASSI Giglio Rosso on 30 May 1931. Fifteen competitors from eight nations competed in the event. ==Schedule== All times are local time. Date Time Round 30 May 1931 9:00 Preliminaries 30 May 1931 10:15 Semi-finals 30 May 1931 15:45 Final ==Results== ===Preliminaries=== The heats took place on 30 May from 9:00am (local time). The first two athletes in each heats continued to the semi- finals and the third athlete of the first and fourth heath. ====Preliminary Heat 1==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 8.0 Q 2 8.2 Q 3 - Q 4 Silvia Capsali - ====Preliminary Heat 2==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Lisa Gelius 8.2 Q 2 Veronika Kohlbach 8.4 Q 3 Giulia Novack - ====Preliminary Heat 3==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Nellie Halstead 8.0 Q 2 - Q 3 Anna Hřebřinová - 4 Claudia Testoni - ====Preliminary Heat 4==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Daisy Ridgley 8.0 Q 2 Lidia Bongiovanni - Q 3 Zrnka Krajnović - Q 4 - ===Semi-finals=== The semi-finals took place also in the morning session at 10:15am (local time). The top three athletes of both semi- finals qualified for the final. ====Semi-final 1==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Daisy Ridgley 8.2 Q 2 - Q 3 Veronika Kolbach - Q 4 - 5 Zrnka Krajnović align=left - ====Semi-final 2==== Rank Name Nationality Time Notes 1 Nellie Halstead 8.2 Q 2 Lisa Gelius - Q 3 - Q 4 - 5 Lidia Bongiovanni - ===Final=== The final of the 60 metres event took place during the afternoon session at 15:45 (local time). Rank Name Nationality Time Notes Nellie Halstead 8.0 Lisa Gelius - \- 4 - 5 Daisy Ridgley - 6 Veronika Kohlbach - ==Related pages== *Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games – 60 metres *Athletics at the 1934 Women's World Games – 60 metres ==References== Category:Athletics at the Olympics of Grace
title: Athletics at the Olympics of Grace – 60 metres
